title: whole_economies_rely_on_illness_shorts_short_fyp
body: we've got this deal with the devil now where whole economies depend on illness for a type of sort of GDP that's not a sustainable model to have people get sicker and sicker younger and younger on more drugs yes it's creating economic activity but it's not creating what the whole point of economic activity is for people to enjoy a prosperous life and there's nothing prosperous about needing to be on medications or crutches or needing a walker or requiring a car to get from point A to point B because you can't walk anymore
